LEVELS.ui_required: if(sectionFocus === 0){ui_activate(ui.R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R);} else if(sectionFocus === 1){ui_activate(ui.R); ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);} else if(sectionFocus === 2){ui_activate(ui.R); ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);} else if(sectionFocus === 3){ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);}
LEVELS.ui_path: switch(sectionFocus) { case 0: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(1); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } break; } case 1: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(2); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } else if(direction === 'L') { section_request(0); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } case 2: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(3); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } else if(direction === 'L') { section_request(1); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } case 3: { if(direction === 'L') { section_request(2); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } }

LEVELS.ui_required: if(sectionFocus === 0){ui_activate(ui.R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R);} else if(sectionFocus === 1){ui_activate(ui.R); ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);} else if(sectionFocus === 2){ui_activate(ui.R); ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_R); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);} else if(sectionFocus === 3){ui_activate(ui.L); hint_activate(ui.HINT_L);}
LEVELS.ui_path: switch(sectionFocus) { case 0: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(1); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } break; } case 1: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(2); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } else if(direction === 'L') { section_request(0); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } case 2: { if(direction === 'R') { section_request(3); activated = true; player.playerDirection('F'); } else if(direction === 'L') { section_request(1); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } case 3: { if(direction === 'L') { section_request(2); activated = true; player.playerDirection('B'); } break; } }
